Hero.title: Mojeeb ai Your first voice with the customer, and your unforgettable impression. He responds, understands, and serves...Before you don't respond

feature1.description: Custom human-like voice for each facility or brand.

feature2.description: Direct integration with ticketing systems and CRM.

feature3.description: Call analysis and providing accurate order summaries.

feature4.description: Customization of various scenarios for each entity.

feature5.description: Directly send orders or alerts to the work team.

feature6.description: Support for Arabic language and local dialects

1.title: Clinics and Hospitals
1.description: Provide a professional patient experience by automatically responding to booking appointments and medical reminders, reducing pressure on administrative staff. Automatically confirm and schedule appointments and reduce cancellations thanks to automated reminders.

2.title: Tourist facilities and hotels
2.description: Manage customer calls about flights and reservations with a voice assistant. Respond to flight inquiries. • Confirm reservations and change appointments. • Providing promotions.

3.title: E-commerce and services companies
3.description: Providing quick responses to bank customers, including daily inquiries and alerts.• Respond to balance inquiries.• Remind customers of payment dates. • Transforming complex cases of human support. • Voice verification support.

4.title: Training institutes
4.description: Education platforms benefit from a smart assistant who manages inquiries, sends reminders, and relieves the burden on employees. This includes answering academic questions, confirming registration, and managing support tickets.

5.title: Charities and organizations
5.description: Providing immediate support to professional clients, without pressure on teams. Respond to registration and assistance terms. Automatically register orders and follow up. Support in both languages to expand service and reduce late calls.

WhyMojeebSection.title: Why Mojeeb AI?
WhyMojeebSection.subtitle: The assistant that handles receiving violations and delivering them to reminders or actions without human intervention.

monitoring.title: Continuous Monitoring and Improvement
monitoring.description: Periodic reports and quick challenges to evaluate the service and make rapid decisions.

hours.title: Providing Working Hours
hours.description: Saves team time and reduces the number of repeated violations by a large percentage.

readiness.title: Work Readiness
readiness.description: With KJB activation, it starts serving operations without complex training or preparation.

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.description: Handles receiving violations and delivering them to reminders or actions without human intervention.

EnrollmentInstructions.title: Enrollment Form Instructions
EnrollmentInstructions.description: Please carefully read the following conditions and tips before submitting your enrollment form.
EnrollmentInstructions.formCompleteDescription: All form fields must be filled accurately and completely.
EnrollmentInstructions.companyInfoDescription: Provide official company name as registered legally.
EnrollmentInstructions.validWebsiteDescription: Must be a working website with your company's official domain.
EnrollmentInstructions.addressDescription: Provide complete physical business address (no P.O. boxes).
EnrollmentInstructions.legalDescription: Commercial register and tax ID must be valid and up-to-date.
EnrollmentInstructions.contactInfoDescription: Ensure your email and phone number are correct to receive status updates.
EnrollmentInstructions.detailedDescriptionDescription: Clearly explain your business needs and expectations.
EnrollmentInstructions.verificationDescription: Be prepared to provide additional documents if requested.
EnrollmentInstructions.processingTimeDescription: Typically takes 3-5 business days for review and approval.
EnrollmentInstructions.emailDescription: support@example.com for any questions about the enrollment process.

RejectionDialog.title: Confirm Rejection
RejectionDialog.message: Are you sure you want to reject this enrollment?

AcceptDialog.title: Confirm Acceptance
AcceptDialog.message: Are you sure you want to accept this enrollment?

DeleteDialog.title: Delete Enrollment
DeleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this enrollment? This action cannot be undone.

DesktopTableViewEnrollmentForm.title: Enrollment Forms
DesktopTableViewEnrollmentForm.desc: Manage company enrollment applications and their status
DesktopTableViewEnrollmentForm.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or company name

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: When you use "Mujib AI" services, we may collect the following types of data:

userItems.callRecordings: Call recordings (when recording feature is enabled)
userItems.callDetails: Call time and date, call duration, interaction type, mobile number

dataUsage.title: 2. How We Use Data
dataUsage.description: We use the data we collect to:

items.1: Provide and customize the smart response experience
items.2: Improve service quality and voice responses
items.3: Create reports and analytics for the customer
items.4: Send account or system-related alerts or updates

items.1: Data is stored on secure cloud servers
items.2: Recordings and texts are kept for a limited period according to the package or customer request
items.3: We conduct periodic data reviews to ensure security and avoid retaining unnecessary data

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not share your data or your customers' data with any third party except in the following cases:

items.1: When there is explicit permission from the customer
items.2: To comply with Saudi Arabia's regulations and legislation
items.3: When using external service providers, and only to serve the performance of the service

dataProtection.title: 5. Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We use high security standards to protect your data, including:

items.1: Data encryption during transmission and storage
items.3: Periodic review of vulnerabilities and security improvements

customerRights.title: 6. Customer Rights
customerRights.description: The customer has the right to:

items.1: Request a copy of their data
items.2: Modify or delete data upon request (according to regulations)
items.3: Stop the service and withdraw data within a specific period

policyChanges.title: 7. Privacy Policy Modifications
policyChanges.description: We may update this policy from time to time, and you will be notified via email or through the control panel when any substantial changes occur.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.description: For any inquiries regarding privacy or data protection, please contact us

TermsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions for Using "Mujib AI" Service
TermsConditions.intro: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the "Mujib AI" service. By using or subscribing to the service, you agree to comply with these terms.

definitions.title: 1. Definitions
definitions.serviceDefinition: Refers to the Mujib AI platform, which provides smart voice response solutions, conversation analysis, and automatic ticket generation.
definitions.customerDefinition: Any entity or individual who subscribes to the service for a fee.
definitions.userDefinition: Any person authorized by the customer to use the service.

serviceScope.title: 2. Service Scope
serviceScope.description1: The service provides smart voice response to customer calls according to customized scenarios determined by the customer.
serviceScope.description2: The service includes the ability to automatically send tickets, record and analyze calls, and integrate with external services according to the package.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All intellectual property rights in "Mujib AI" including design, source code, user interfaces, and generated content are fully owned by Mujib AI Company.

serviceUsage.title: 4. Service Usage
serviceUsage.description1: The customer agrees not to use the service for any illegal activity or activity that violates norms.
serviceUsage.description2: "Mujib AI" reserves the right to temporarily or permanently suspend the service in case of misuse or violation of terms.

privacyData.title: 5. Privacy and Data
privacyData.description1: All voice data and personal information are handled with complete confidentiality.
privacyData.description2: Calls may be stored for documentation and analysis purposes, and will not be shared with external parties without the customer's prior consent.

subscriptionsPayment.title: 6. Subscriptions and Payment
subscriptionsPayment.description1: Service prices vary by package and include a specified number of usage minutes per month.
subscriptionsPayment.description2: Additional fees are calculated when exceeding the monthly limit according to the announced pricing.
subscriptionsPayment.description3: Non-payment may lead to service suspension.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The customer is responsible for updating scenarios and reviewing response content.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications
modifications.description: "Mujib AI" reserves the right to modify the Terms and Conditions at any time. Customers will be notified of modifications via email or within the control panel, and continued use of the service constitutes acceptance.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are subject to the regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and any dispute shall be resolved by the competent judicial authorities in the city of Riyadh.
